text:
All data for the column 'Notable Projects':

- Record ID 0: [{'project_name': 'Agentic AI framework for material properties prediction', 'description': 'Developed an Agentic AI framework to autonomously collect, synthesize, and predict material properties from scientific literature enabling the design of next generation batteries', 'technologies': ['Gemini 2.5', 'LangChain', 'RAG']}, {'project_name': 'Physics-informed machine learning framework', 'description': 'Reduced the design cycle of new materials from weeks to minutes by developing a physics-informed machine learning framework', 'technologies': ['PyTorch']}, {'project_name': 'Computer vision model for 2D image reconstruction', 'description': 'Reduced computation time by 5x by developing a computer vision model for 2D image reconstruction', 'technologies': ['PyTorch', 'convolutional VAE', 'Transformer']}, {'project_name': 'Large-Scale Social Media Simulation using LLMs', 'description': 'Built a structured dataset from 5,000+ collected tweets, simulated interactions of 400+ LLM-powered AI agents, and designed complex simulations leveraging LLMs to generate and combine text with user behavioral metadata', 'technologies': ['PyDantic', 'LangChain', 'Prompt Engineering', 'GPT-4o', 'Gemini', 'MCP', 'NetworkX']}, {'project_name': 'Embodied Gaming AI Agent', 'description': 'Developed a real-time perception system for zero-shot segmentation and tracking of dynamic objects and integrated Gemini 1.5 Flash VLM for scene understanding and object recognition in dynamic environments', 'technologies': ['Meta SAM2', 'Gemini VLM', 'Gemini 1.5 Flash']}, {'project_name': 'Multi-Agent Fleet Management', 'description': 'Developed an autonomous agent using behavior trees + CNN for competitive multi-agent simulation. Applied feature engineering, model evaluation, and real-time strategy adaptation across sequential game tasks. Incorporated CNN-based perception module to interpret local observations, enabling the agent to prioritize between harvesting resources, avoiding hazards, and attacking opponents depending on context.', 'technologies': ['behavior trees', 'CNN']}, {'project_name': 'Kaggle Sticker Sales Forecasting', 'description': 'Combined ML, deep learning, and statistical methods with feature engineering for demand forecasting. Built an ensemble model with automated hyperparameter tuning.', 'technologies': ['XGBoost', 'Transformers']}, {'project_name': 'AI-Powered Automated Trading System', 'description': 'Trained reinforcement learning agents for predictive trading, achieving a Sharpe ratio of 1.2', 'technologies': ['Reinforcement Learning', 'PPO', 'A2C']}, {'project_name': 'Fintech startup for stock market predictions', 'description': 'Co-founded and drove the strategy for a fintech startup designed to leverage technical indicators and machine learning to improve stock market predictions', 'technologies': []}, {'project_name': 'Real-time data ingestion pipelines', 'description': 'Designed real-time data ingestion pipelines with 99.95% uptime', 'technologies': ['Scrapy', 'Airflow', 'MongoDB', 'GCP']}, {'project_name': 'ML teams in hackathons', 'description': 'Led ML teams in two hackathons, delivering deployed solutions on AWS/GCP with API backends', 'technologies': ['AWS', 'GCP', 'Flask']}]
